text: The 127th Maine Senate had 35 members each elected to two-year terms in November 2014. The first regular session was sworn-in on December 3, 2014. The 127th Senate party composition will be: * 20 Republicans * 15 Democrats ==Leadership== {| table border="1" cellspacing=0 cellpadding="5" ! Position !! Name !! Party !!
